product_name: Nathan TorchLight QuickShot Plus Handheld Gel/Water Bottle
long_description: The Nathan TorchLight QuickShot Plus Handheld Gel / Water Bottle keeps a quick shot of hydration or energy at the ready when you're training or racing, and its reflective material keeps you visible.
short_description: The Nathan TorchLight QuickShot Plus Handheld Gel / Water Bottle keeps a quick shot of hydration or energy at the ready when you're training or racing, and its reflective material keeps you visible.
